Class Chess

java.lang.Object
app.chess.Chess
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game<ChessMove,ChessPiece>, GameView<ChessMove,ChessPiece>
public class Chess extends Object implements Game<ChessMove,ChessPiece>
Chess kernel that implements behavior of standard chess
